summary: In the original movie, the cyborg-teachers were all destroyed. Well that's what we thought, but there's one more rogue military robot out there determined to clean up the education system.

keywords: female nudity|female frontal nudity|killer robot|goofball|psychotronic film
title: Curso del 99: El sustituto
